source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_00<tab>You are given to understand that Mutamix is the keeper of secret materia techniques...
target: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_00<tab>狼煙の丘のミュタミクスは、マテリア装着の禁断の秘儀を知っているらしい。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_01<tab>Mutamix is willing to train you in his secret materia melding techniques. However, the goblin requires proof that you are sufficiently experienced. Demonstrate your skills by melding eight pieces of materia in front of him.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_01<tab>禁断の秘儀を知るためには、鍛錬を積む必要がある。ミュタミクスの近くで、装備品にマテリアを8回装着しよう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_02<tab>You have melded the requisite number of materia. Speak with Mutamix once more to receive of his secret knowledge.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_02<tab>指示された回数、マテリアの装着をした。「狼煙の丘」の「ミュタミクス」に教えを請おう。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_03<tab>Mutamix imparts to you advanced materia melding techniques, which will allow you to attach more pieces of materia to an item than ordinarily possible. Know, though, that success is not guaranteed, and failure means losing the materia.
target: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_SEQ_03<tab>ミュタミクスから、マテリア装着Ⅱを教わった。これで、禁断の秘儀を行える。しかし、失敗したらマテリアは粉々になってしまう。成功も失敗も運次第だ。
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_TODO_00<tab>ミュタミクスの近くで装備品にマテリアを装着する

source:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_000<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander is joiner of materia?
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_000<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……。
おぬしゃ　ちしきの　たんきゅうしゃ～？

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_001<tab>Uplander desires to join muchly, yes? Then Mutamix makes braincase of uplander rattle with secret knowings of materia!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_001<tab>ひとつの　武具に　いっぱい　マテリア
特殊な道具で　むりやり　くっつけ～。
秘儀を　つかえば　できるぞな～。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_002<tab>...But first, uplander must be proving readiness. Uplander showy-do attaching eight pieces of materia, then let uplander and Mutamix trade tongueflaps again.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_002<tab>知りたい　だったら　鍛錬ぞ～。
マテリア　くっつけ　見せるぞな～。
8回つけたら　伝授ぞな～。

source:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_010<tab>Pshhh... Shkohhh...
Uplander has good joiny-skill! Mutamix give uplander secret knowings of wordbond!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_010<tab>シュコォ……シュコォ……
マテリア　装着　はげんだの～！
おぬしゃ　なかなか　たっしゃぞな～！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_011<tab>Mosty-part, one fighty-tool bears only little materia. But if uplander uses secret joiny-skill, one fighty-tool bears many materia...maybe.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_011<tab>ひとつの　武具に　いっぱい　マテリア
せいこう　しっぱい　運しだい～
いどむも勇気　やめるも勇気～！

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_012<tab>Mutamix teach uplander secret joiny-skill...but uplander keep in braincase that it sometimes work unrightly.
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_012<tab>しっぱいすれば　マテリア　こなごな
無残に散りて　星へと帰る～。
何も残らず　星へと帰る～。

source: TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_013<tab>Will fighty-tool of uplander bear many materia? Or will materia turn to bittybits? Using secret joiny-skill not for unstrong of bladder!
target:
TEXT_SUBWIL502_00640_MUTAMIX_013<tab>せいこうすれば　マテリア　かがやき
億万長者も　夢じゃない～。
いどむも勇気　やめるも勇気～！
